comments.body:
The README is automatically generated by conda-smithy each time the package is re-rendered so you should never modify it directly. If you want to customise it you should modify the `about` second of the metadata, potentially including a `description`:

```suggestion
  summary: "Scientific library for realtime signal processing and eigenanalysis of evolving systems."
  description : |
     This awesome package does:
         * This
         * and this
         * and this

     If you use this for a publication please cite xxx.
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@  license_family: "APACHE"
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: "Scientific library for realtime signal processing and eigenanalysis of evolving systems."
  dev_url: https://gitlab.com/thucyd-dev/thucyd
